text: Charles de La Verpillière (born May 31, 1954 in Bourg-en-Bresse, Ain) is a French politician of The Republicans who currently serves as a member of the National Assembly of France, representing the second constituency of the Ain department. ==Political career== In the Republicans’ 2016 presidential primaries, de La Verpillière endorsed Bruno Le Maire as the party's candidate for the office of President of France.Ludovic Vigogne (April 20, 2016), Bataillons: Primaire à droite: la liste des premiers soutiens parlementaires L'Opinion. ==Recognition== La Verpillière is a Chevalier of the Legion of Honour as well as a Chevalier of the National Order of Merit. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bourg-en-Bresse Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 15th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Chevaliers of the Légion d'honneur Category:Knights of the National Order of Merit (France) Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies for Ain (French Fifth Republic) Category:École nationale d'administration alumni
title: Charles de la Verpillière
